item.title: By: suzanne berland
item.dc:creator: suzanne berland
item.description:
I have been searching for a pattern for these houses, all in vain! Could you tell me where to find one? I would be willing to pay for a sample, but you are no longer on Etsy.
suzanne
item.content:encoded:
I have been searching for a pattern for these houses, all in vain! Could you tell me where to find one? I would be willing to pay for a sample, but you are no longer on Etsy.

suzanne

item.title: By: Blackbird Experience
item.dc:creator: Blackbird Experience
item.description: only if I traveled like mad. I like book books too much. I think they can coexist though. -- I didn't even realize you responded to this? Need to make myself notified next time.<br /><br />This book just came in to work yesterday and it's REALLY NICE -- -egad, as if I need another book on my to-buy list!! :P
item.content:encoded:
only if I traveled like mad. I like book books too much. I think they can coexist though. — I didn’t even realize you responded to this? Need to make myself notified next time.

This book just came in to work yesterday and it’s REALLY NICE — -egad, as if I need another book on my to-buy list!! ðŸ˜›

item.title: By: Blackbird Experience
item.dc:creator: Blackbird Experience
item.description: P.S. I find it disconcerting that a book about upcycling books is available in a kindle edition. *queasy*
item.content:encoded: P.S. I find it disconcerting that a book about upcycling books is available in a kindle edition. *queasy*

item.title: By: Blackbird Experience
item.dc:creator: Blackbird Experience
item.description: super uber cute! The houses, not the throwing. Well, I suppose the throwing might be cute to some types ... but we try to avoid those, no? Anyhow... they are CUTE! might be interesting to try with pasted together pages of old books? Would that be possible? Hmmmm (by the way I DON'T NEED MORE PROJECTS but)
item.content:encoded: super uber cute! The houses, not the throwing. Well, I suppose the throwing might be cute to some types … but we try to avoid those, no? Anyhow… they are CUTE! might be interesting to try with pasted together pages of old books? Would that be possible? Hmmmm (by the way I DON’T NEED MORE PROJECTS but)
